title: Readout of White House Meeting with Global Reproductive Rights Leaders | The White House
content: On Tuesday, June 21, officials from the White House Gender Policy Council and National Security Council convened a meeting with leaders and experts on global reproductive rights. Participants discussed how a ruling in Dobbs v. Jackson Women’s Health Organization might impact access to sexual and reproductive health and rights around the world, and offered recommendations to the Administration to protect and advance women’s health globally.   White House officials thanked the leaders for their efforts and underscored the Administration’s commitment to support sexual and reproductive health and rights across the globe.Participants included:###
